name: I'm Ad Work
description:
A simple game wherein you try to get as much work done as you can while ads are constantly popping up on your computer.

Welcome to your new job! Too bad your PC got infected on your very first day. Anyway, expect the following:

  • Riveting click, drag, and type gameplay
  • Ads and texts full of entertaining gibberish and references
  • Level intensity that increases as you complete more and more tasks in a row. You get more points per task, but the timers get shorter!
  • A leaderboard to record your high scores

Note: The leaderboard is local to your device. Feel free to share your top scores in the comments!

If you run into any bugs, feel free to send your reports in the comments as well. Please provide a detailed description as to how you encountered the bug/s.

CREDITS

Game Designer, Programmer, Writer, 2D Artist, UI/UX Designer
Ghara2

Sound Designer, Music Producer
Xavier Arevalo

If you enjoyed this, consider supporting me for my future projects!
